Actions.Name: Pheremones
Actions.Description: A foe in range 4 is branded. Branded foes are pacified.

Actions.Name: Spur
Actions.Description: The character the symbiote is latched on to dashes 3 and may deal [fray] damage to an adjacent character of the symbiote's choice.

Actions.Name: Berserk
Actions.Description: The Symbiote's host becomes sturdy, gains +1 action, and gains +1 boon on all attacks and saves. These effects last until the end of the host's next turn.
